sqlfpc.sql: tds ProductDTO,HospitalDTO where ProductDTO.productType='COMMON' and ProductDTO.quantity>0
sqlfpc.parsedsql: SELECT * FROM ProductDTO INNER JOIN HospitalDTO ON ProductDTO.hospitalDTOId = HospitalDTO.id WHERE ProductDTO.productType = 'COMMON' AND ProductDTO.quantity > 0

fpcrule.sql: SELECT * FROM ProductDTO INNER JOIN HospitalDTO ON ProductDTO.hospitalDTOId = HospitalDTO.id WHERE (ProductDTO.productType = 'COMMON') AND (ProductDTO.quantity > 0)
fpcrule.description: --A set of joined tables such that: --The WHERE condition fulfills: --(T) ProductDTO.productType = 'COMMON' is TRUE --(T) ProductDTO.quantity > 0 is TRUE

fpcrule.sql: SELECT * FROM ProductDTO INNER JOIN HospitalDTO ON ProductDTO.hospitalDTOId = HospitalDTO.id WHERE NOT(ProductDTO.productType = 'COMMON') AND (ProductDTO.quantity > 0)
fpcrule.description: --A set of joined tables such that: --The WHERE condition fulfills: --(F) ProductDTO.productType = 'COMMON' is FALSE --(T) ProductDTO.quantity > 0 is TRUE

fpcrule.sql: SELECT * FROM ProductDTO INNER JOIN HospitalDTO ON ProductDTO.hospitalDTOId = HospitalDTO.id WHERE NOT(ProductDTO.quantity > 0) AND (ProductDTO.productType = 'COMMON')
fpcrule.description: --A set of joined tables such that: --The WHERE condition fulfills: --(F) ProductDTO.quantity > 0 is FALSE --(T) ProductDTO.productType = 'COMMON' is TRUE

fpcrule.sql: SELECT * FROM ProductDTO RIGHT JOIN HospitalDTO ON ProductDTO.hospitalDTOId = HospitalDTO.id WHERE (ProductDTO.hospitalDTOId IS NULL) AND (HospitalDTO.id IS NOT NULL)
fpcrule.description: --The JOIN tables fulfill: --COMMENT: Reduced conditions: [ProductDTO.productType = 'COMMON'] ; [ProductDTO.quantity > 0] ; --summary: [ProductDTO] right [HospitalDTO] ON ProductDTO.hospitalDTOId = HospitalDTO.id --There exist some row in table HospitalDTO --which does not join to any table in ProductDTO
